subtitleNullable: Extract IT skills from Job Descriptions
descriptionNullable:
Dataset of Job descriptions and relevant IT skills, soft skills, education and experience required for the job. 
Hard skills include IT keywords from job descriptions. It can be used to train LLM models to extract skills from various IT specific job descriptions
title: IT Skills from Jobs
subtitle: Extract IT skills from Job Descriptions
description:
Dataset of Job descriptions and relevant IT skills, soft skills, education and experience required for the job. 
Hard skills include IT keywords from job descriptions. It can be used to train LLM models to extract skills from various IT specific job descriptions
